description: These cookies have a delicious crunch and bite with the delightful sweetness of White Chocolate.
name: White Chocolate & Macadamia Christmas Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the butter with the sugar and vanilla extract until its combined fully. Crack the egg into the mix and combine fully.
Incremently sieve in the flour, allspice, baking powder and baking soda into the bowl while mixing.
Finally add the white chocolate chips and crushed macadmia nuts and once its combined, allow to set in the fridge for 1 hour.
Pre-heat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. Now seperate the dough mix into 10 balls and flatten into your desired cookie shape.
Place the cookies on some baking paper, on a baking tray and bake for 20 minutes.
Check the cookies while cooking as some people may prefer a soft center cookie and others a more crunch so adjust cooking times where needed.
